extendedInfo.description: Access the Downers Grove Public Library from your Android! Reserve titles, access your account, find hours, get directions, contact us, download eBooks, and research a variety of topics - all on the go!

reviews.title: Good, but limited.
reviews.comment: Handy for checking your record but difficult to renew items. Would be great if there was an option to renew multiple items at the same time. Also I would love to see an option to set an alarm for items that are due.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it but could be much better
reviews.comment: Like a previous review, an alarm/reminder & calender insert for books due would go a long way towards making this app more useful. Enjoy browsing the bookshelves though without having time be \"in\" the library as I\'m usually available during closing hours.
reviews.author: Dawn Tuskey
